description.title: Events: web3js client using eth.subscribe on logs (event Keccak256 only)
description.purpose: This is the third of three ways to get event logs for a contract event that is emitted. It is a subscription approach where eth.subscribe is used on the web3 instance, and the topic to filter on is the keccak256 of the event signature. As no contract address is supplied it should pick up on any event with the Keccak256 on the event signature.
